articles.title: Kim Jong Un Acknowledges Letters from Ordinary People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Acknowledges Letters from Ordinary People
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent his autographs to officials and working people of different units and teachers and students of the country on Feb. 9 after reading the letters they presented to him on the Day of the Shining Star, which carried their pledge to implement the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Among them were officials of the Sonchon County Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, employees of the Kangdong Hydro-power Construction Complex and the Korean April 26 Children's Film Studio, girls who volunteered to go to Taehung from Pyongyang, teachers and students of Ryongrim Secondary School in Ryongrim County of Jagang Province and Min Hong Dan, Ri Chuk Bok, Ri Kyong Yon, Ryu So Gum and Ko Hu Hoe to whom Kim Jong Il wished good luck for the future. 
					
					In the letters they expressed their ardent yearning for Kim Jong Il and profound reverence for Kim Jong Un who is identical to him in idea and leadership traits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life Based on Songun Politics
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life Based on Songun Politics
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are recollecting leader Kim Jong Il's great life with the approach of the Day of the Shining Star, his birthday (February 16). 
					Born in Mt. Paektu, a sacred mountain of revolution, in the period of the hard-fought anti-Japanese war, he wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea, army and people, performing great feats for the country and people and for the times and history. 
					
					He regarded it as his lifelong mission to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu. He developed the Juche idea, the Songun (military-first) idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as the guiding idea in the era of independence. 
					
					Kim Jong Il made a good example in accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President and put the national dignity and power on the highest level.  
					
					He paid much effort to putting the munitions industry on the Juche-oriented and modern basis. 
					
					What is his greatest feat is that he creditably defended the socialist gains and turned the DPRK into an invincible political and military power and nuclear state by dint of Songun politics. 
					
					He encouraged all the people to turn out in the effort for making a great progress in socialist construction. 
					
					In Juche 100 (2011) alone, he made uninterrupted field guidance tours of Jagang and South Hamgyong provinces and all other parts of the country, inspiring all people to carry on an industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					He also had north-south summits in Pyongyang in 2000 and 2007 and adopted historic declarations, ushering in the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					He conducted energetic external activities for the victory of the cause of socialism, world peace and stability and friendship and solidarity among people under the banner of independence against imperialism to make great feats in the effort for the independence of humankind. 
					
					Indeed, his whole life is a heroic one of a great revolutionary who pioneered a new path with an iron will and energetic activities, holding high the red flag.

articles.title: Noble International Obligation and Great Love of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Noble International Obligation and Great Love of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- With approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Korean people and the world's progressives are looking back with deep emotion on his noble traits whereby a great epic of international obligation and human love was created.
					Kim Jong Il was the greatest man with highest sense of obligation and human love none of the great persons in the world could match.
					
					He laid a wreath at the mausoleum of Lenin at Red Square in Moscow during his historic visit to Russia in August 2001. This fact, which drew deep attention of the international community, clearly showed the world what is the pure moral sense of obligation a revolutionary should have toward leader of the working class.
					
					On the 60th anniversary of the Chinese People's Volunteers' entry into the Korean front he visited the former CPV Command and laid wreaths at the grave of Mao Anying and the cemetery of fallen CPV fighters.
					
					He had also taken meticulous care of the widow and children of the head of state of an African country for over 10 years and showed warm love for the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr. He sent a wreath to the tomb to Zhang Weihua on the 70th anniversary of his death and would invite his bereaved family to the DPRK whenever opportunity presented itself.
					
					Such love of his reached a large number of families of related persons including Zhou Baozhong, Feng Zhongyun, Shang Yue, Chen Lei, Hu Zhenyi and Chai Shiying, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					On his foreign trip Kim Jong Il personally met with Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, and his family and gave gifts to them. When Nobichenko died he saw to it that his personal message of condolence and wreath and consolatory money in the name of the DPRK government were sent.
					
					Besides, many families of the world received his love, among them those of Nikolai Lashenko of the former Soviet Union, Guy Dupre of France, Checa of Peru, Giancarlo Elia Valori of Italy, Ch. Surenjav of Mongolia and Yoshiyuki Oe of Japan.
					
					Foreigners, who once stayed in the DPRK, too, experienced his warm loving care.
					
					Medical workers of the Pyongyang Friendship Hospital brought back to life more than hundreds of foreigners who had been in a badly critical condition. Among them were a staff member of the Palestinian embassy here and a staff member of the Egyptian embassy.
					
					At the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital more than 7 000 foreign women got medical service and at least 500 of them gave easy births over the past 30 odd years.
					
					Kim Jong Il personally named some of their babies, born with friendship at this hospital, "Jindallae", "Solmae", "Saeppyol" and "Masolgwang".

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A performance of art circles of ministries and national institutions was staged at the People's Palace of Culture today on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					It was enjoyed by Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions. 
					
					Colorful programs included poem and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", tale and chorus "February Is Spring", "General Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot", Oungum ensemble "The Great Bear Is a Star of Yearning" and women's vocal trio and small chorus "O, We Long For You".
					
					The performers impressively sang their deep yearnings for the peerless patriot, father of the nation who continued his forced march till the last moments of his life.
					
					Numbers like women's chorus "When We Sing of Songun", chorus "I'll Be the Flower to Herald the Spring" and Kayagum ensemble "Three Thousand-ri of Vinalon" helped the audience realize that thanks to the patriotic long march made by Kim Jong Il there took place many eye-opening events noteworthy in the history of the nation.
					
					Poem and chorus "We Pledge" and "Footsteps" and men's chorus "Let Us Keep Pace with the General" touched the heartstrings of the audience. They reflected the pledge of the Korean people to be faithful persons of the era of a great surge who carry out the intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, upholding Kim Jong Il in high esteem for eternity. 
					
					The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Old Home, Revolutionary Museums and Sites in DPRK Crowed with Visitors
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Old Home, Revolutionary Museums and Sites in DPRK Crowed with Visitors
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's old home in the Paektusan secret camp and the revolutionary museums and sites including Kim Il Sung University are nowadays crowded with servicepersons, working people and school youth and children with his birth anniversary approaching.
					The Oun Revolutionary Site, too, draws an endless stream of visitors every day. An average of more than 6 000 visitors a day visit this site where Kim Jong Il conducted ideo-theoretical activities in a unique way and military activities during his military encampment.
					
					Among those sites and museums are also the Jangsan Revolutionary Site and the revolutionary museum at the Pyongyang Textile Mill.

articles.title: Performance of University Students Art Groups Given in DPRK
articles.content:
Performance of University Students Art Groups Given in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A performance of art groups of university students from across the country was given at the Central Youth Hall Monday to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The performance began with narration and chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary hymn. Put on its stage were colorful numbers presented by art group members of universities, including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts and Huichon University of Technology, and students in the field of art education.
					
					In poem and song "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", an immortal masterpiece, and female chorus "Let Us Glorify the Country as Intended by the General" the performers highly sang of the undying feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Among the numbers are Kayagum ensemble "Looking back on Our Happiness" and story-telling in unison "Whispering" that impressively showed the happy looks of the university students and their lofty ideological and moral world.
					
					In poem and story-telling and song "We Will Always Cherish the Day in Mind" and poem and chorus "We Will Be Loyal down through Generations" the performers expressed the resolution of the students to prepare themselves as pillars for building a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Enjoying the performance were Choe Yong Rim, Yang Hyong Sop and Choe Ryong Hae and officials concerned, officials and youth and students in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: "February Is Spring", Song Eulogizing Kim Jong Il's Birth
articles.content:
"February Is Spring", Song Eulogizing Kim Jong Il's Birth
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- February is one of the winter months in Korea. In this month, the Korean people sorely miss leader Kim Jong Il, singing the song "February Is Spring".
					February 16 is his birthday. The song eulogizes his birth as the advent of the spring season.
					
					It represents the Korean people's pride in having Kim Jong Il born in a log cabin in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu, while saying his birth in February led to a bright prospect of Korea.
					
					In his lifetime, the leader devoted his all to the wellbeing of the people with the Songun (military-first) politics.
					
					With his birth anniversary drawing nearer, the song is enjoying a great popularity among the Korean people.

articles.title: National Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
National Cooking Competition Held
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A national cooking competition was held at the Changgwangsan Hotel with the approach of the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The competition was attended by some 100 cooks selected from across the country.
					
					They competed in cooking seafood stew and cold vegetable dish mixed with steamed chickens and making vegetable decorations for dishes.
					
					The cooks from the Ryusong Guidance Bureau, restaurants in Pyongyang and Kangwon Province, Chongryu Restaurant and Taesong Department Store Restaurant won prizes at the competition.  
					
					The competition served as a good occasion in improving cooking in the country.

articles.title: National Book Show Opens in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Book Show Opens in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A national book show opened with due ceremony at the Grand People's Study House on Monday to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed at the show are more than 30 000 books and magazines of 20 000 odd categories published in the DPRK and other countries.
					
					The show has stands earmarked for different publishing houses and dissemination services. 
					
					The stand of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House displays "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", "Works of Kim Il Sung", President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century", "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" and other works and social and political books. 
					
					The stands of the Kumsong Youth Publishing House, the Art and Literature Publishing House and the Working People's Organizations Publishing House exhibit magazines carrying immortal masterpieces authored by Kim Jong Il, series of novels and books comprehensively dealing with the revolutionary exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and other publications that are conducive to ideological education and cultural and emotional life of officials, working people and school youth and children.
					
					Various kinds of books, magazines, dictionaries and picture albums are seen at the stands of the Social Science Book Publishing House, the Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House, the Foreign Languages Publishing House, the Foreign Language Books Publishing House and the Sports Newspaper.
					
					The stand of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) shows books and magazines injecting the love for the country and the nation into its officials and other Koreans. 
					
					The stand of the dissemination services displays works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books on personality of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and achievements in socialist construction of the DPRK that were published in different countries.
					
					Present at the ceremony was Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: New Book on Kim Jong Il Off Press
articles.content:
New Book on Kim Jong Il Off Press
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out the fifth volume "Peerless Patriotl" of 5 volume-book "Comrade Kim Jong Il, Legendary Great Man," to be published on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The book has 4 chapters.
					
					The first chapter "Possessor of Noble Outlook on Country" deals in detail with the distinguished personality of Kim Jong Il who formulated the Juche-based outlook on the homeland which neither thinker nor politician could do in human history.
					
					The second chapter "Leader Who Opened Juche-oriented Navigation Route" deals with the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by dynamically paving the way for patriotism explored by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The third chapter "Paragon of Great Patriotic Devotion" tells touching stories about the personality of Kim Jong Il who taught through his life that the true love for the country and the nation should be total dedication to be made with one's whole soul and great enthusiasm.
					
					The fourth chapter "Nation's Hero Who Ushered in a New Era of the Prosperity of the Country" tells about the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by putting the DPRK's dignity and prestige on a highest level and leading all people to accomplish the greatest patriotic cause of building a thriving socialist nation with his outstanding leadership art.

articles.title: Our Classroom Literature Prize Conferred on Pupils in DPRK
articles.content:
Our Classroom Literature Prize Conferred on Pupils in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- At least 400 pupils across the country are awarded Our Classroom Literature Prize for writing a lot of excellent literary works last year on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					An awarding ceremony took place at the Youth League Hall on Monday.
					
					Among their works are the childpoems "Singing of Nostalgia", "Study Site on Mangyong Hill" highly praising the immortal revolutionary life of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					Lyric "The World, Watch Us Please ", children's song "We Will Show Him" and other works impressively deal with the patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il who brought about great innovations and great leap forward by giving ceaseless field guidance to work sites for a great surge across the country.
					
					Their works also include a selection of childpoems "Farm Fields Where My Father Works ", lyric "He Is a Graduate from Our School" which deal with the dynamic labor drive of fathers, mothers, brothers and sisters for the building of a thriving country. And children's song "Height to Be a Soldier", childpoem "We Will Become Children of Songun" and other works reflect the will of the younger generation to grow up to be dependable builders of Songun Korea.
					
					There are also among them works on diverse themes depicting school children conducting a brisk do-good-thing campaign helpful to building a thriving nation.

articles.title: New House for Education through Trees Bearing Slogans Built
articles.content:
New House for Education through Trees Bearing Slogans Built
Phyongsong, February 13 (KCNA) -- A new house for the education through trees bearing slogans was built in South Phyongan Province on the occasion of birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					The house has six rooms.
					
					Displayed in the first room, the introductory room, is an oil painting "Immortal Handwriting" illustrated with photos of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu. There is a map showing the distribution of 127 trees bearing slogans discovered in cities and counties of the province.
					
					On display in the second room are the trees on which anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters wrote slogans and their photos. They include slogans "Commander Kim ll Sung is a god for all people. Only when Commander Kim is held in high esteem is it possible to achieve liberation by ourselves and build a paradise" and "Shining Star appeared in the sky above Mt. Paektu. It shines all over the country. All people, look up to it".
					
					The third, fourth and fifth rooms are devoted to trees bearing slogans written by members of underground revolutionary organizations in the homeland.
					
					Those slogans include "The illustrious Commander Kim Il Sung's art of shrinking the earth reached here, the land of Phyongan" and "Let us put forward Commander Kim Il Sung as the supreme leader, woman commander Kim Jong Suk as woman leader and the Shining Star as a future leader and demonstration the dignity of our nation after the independence of Korea".
					
					There are also slogans reflecting the Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland and those arousing the people to a sacred war for the liberation of the country.
					
					Materials on the achievements made in the education through trees bearing slogans are displayed in the sixth room.
					
					On the threshold of the Day of the Shining Star it is visited by hundreds of party members and other working people and school youth and children everyday.

articles.title: Stadiums, Gyms Facelifted in DPRK
articles.content:
Stadiums, Gyms Facelifted in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Stadiums and gymnasiums have been renovated in the DPRK.
					The football pitch of Kim Il Sung Stadium was newly covered with synthetic grass and its electronic scoreboard, lounge and press conference room were renewed. 
					
					Yanggakdo Football Stadium has improved its running track, while Sosan Football Stadium has undergone a facelifting. 
					
					Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Ice Rink on the banks of the Pothong River and gymnasiums in Chongchun Street have been modernized.
					
					Training facilities have been reinforced in various sports teams and sports schools.
					
					The Amnokgang Sports Team has built a physical training center and the Taesongsan Sports Team has completed the construction of a gymnasium and outdoor training ground. 
					
					The Pothonggang District Juvenile Sports School has constructed table-tennis and boxing training facilities and a gymnasium.
					
					The Kangdong County Juvenile Sports School has completed the frame project of a gymnasium equipped with a swimming pool.

articles.title: KCNA Snubs Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about Dialogue
articles.content:
KCNA Snubs Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about Dialogue
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is now free to let loose a spate of rigmaroles, lost to shame. The minister of Unification of south Korea, addressing a recent meeting of lawmakers from ruling and opposition parties, talked about the "resumption of south-north dialogue" in mid-April.
					He said the north is not in a position to negotiate with the Lee Myung Bak "government" without conditions but "the instability of its system" is compelling it to put on hold a decision to have a dialogue with the south. 
					
					Tight-cornered at home and abroad, the Lee group has been busy putting on airs and making eyes at the north. It has gone the lengths of daring hurt its dignity.
					
					This is a clear indication that the group's ill nature and bad habit can never change unless it meets its end.
					
					Its behavior amounts to a blatant provocation intended to hold the DPRK responsible for the frozen north-south relations, pursuant to its "waiting strategy" aimed at leading it to a change.
					
					In a statement of its National Defence Commission on Dec. 30 last year, the DPRK clarified its principled stand that it would never deal with the Lee group as it is bereft of even elementary ethics and morality as human beings. 
					
					On Feb. 2 this year the DPRK sent the south Korean authorities nine open questionnaires which reflected the will of its army and people. In these questionnaires it strongly urged them to give clear answers to them if they truly want dialogue.
					
					In the wake of this development, strong voices are heard from different circles in south Korea urging the puppet government to apologize and repent of things it had done to bring the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse.
					
					The "Grand National Party" on which Lee Myung Bak counted also called for totally bolting from him while urging his defection from the party and resignation. It kicked up such a row as reshaping the "keynote of its north policy" and changing its name.
					
					In the meantime, media of south Korea are following every move of the group and deriding it, as it is even seeking a roundabout method to resume dialogue even after being deprived of every justification for negotiating with the DPRK.
					
					The Lee group is vehemently rebuffed by the south Korean public.
					
					It is ridiculous, indeed, for the group to trumpet about "resumption of dialogue" as it is completely isolated.
					
					The group of traitors is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can cover up the anti-reunification and traitorous nature of the joint nuclear war maneuvers it is going to stage with outside forces and hold the upcoming "general election" in its favor through its publicity stunt of "dialogue." 
					
					Clear is the stance of the DPRK.
					
					The Lee group can neither be a dialogue partner of the DPRK nor expect any dialogue as long as it declines to give answers to the questionnaires.
					
					Its "waiting strategy" will only precipitate its political ruin.

articles.title: Deployment of U.S. Marines in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Deployment of U.S. Marines in S. Korea under Fire
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea denounced the deployment of Okinawa-based U.S. marines in south Korea. It held a news conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 9. 
					The organization said the U.S. is reviewing the plan for moving some forces of its marines based on Okinawa of Japan to south Korea. 
					
					The deployment in south Korea of a typical offensive unit specializing in landing would coil up the tension of the Korean Peninsula, it said.
					
					Such a move of the U.S. pursuant to its new military strategy is aimed to burden south Korea with the expense for the relocation of the U.S. forces in Japan and furthermore push forward the triangular military nexus among south Korea, the U.S. and Japan, it added.
					
					In June 2010, Lee Myung Bak told the U.S. chief executive that south Korea would like to provide some land needed for the transfer of the U.S. military base in Japan, it deplored. 
					
					The authorities deny this, but Lee Myung Bak is so much steeped to the pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese idea to the marrow of his bones as to do such a humiliating act. The deployment of the U.S. marines in south Korea is attributable to the sycophantic traitorous attitude of the ruling quarters, the organization said, stressing: 
					
					The allowance of the deployment would risk the fate of the ruling quarters. 
					
					It is natural for the U.S. to vacate its overseas bases.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Crackdown upon Media Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Crackdown upon Media Flayed
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo issued a statement on Feb. 10 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their crackdown upon media.
					The fascist regime on Feb. 9 set in motion the Intelligence Service to search the house and office of Ri Chang Gi, representative of Jaju Minbo, and arrest him, the statement noted, adding:
					
					This repressive action taken by the Lee regime recently is aimed to stop the activities of Jaju Minbo.
					
					The present authorities are seeking to tide over the crisis by creating a terror-ridden atmosphere of suppression just as what the preceding regimes did, forsaken by the nation and the people.
					
					Outdated is the method employed by the authorities to suppress patriotic organizations and figures on charges of violation of the "Security Law" by groundlessly linking their activities with the north, the statement charged, declaring that they would never yield to any crackdown by the traitorous regime just as they have dynamically advanced along the road of independence, democracy and reunification despite suppression and difficulties and thus frustrate the anti-reunification acts without fail.
					
					The statement demanded the authorities stop at once the investigation aimed at suppressing media on false charges and release the unreasonably arrested Ri Chang Gi.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group More Dead than Alive
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group More Dead than Alive
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- As already known, there broke out in south Korea at the outset of the year a scandal in which a pro-Lee Myung Bak candidate for the chief of the "Grand National Party" distributed enveloped money among lawmakers from the same party during its congress in 2008.
					Pak Hui Thae, speaker of the puppet National Assembly, was forced to resign on Feb. 9 for being one of the "Six Men's Association" chiefly to blame for this scam. 
					
					The association is an unofficial highest decision-making body formed inside the GNP for the election of Lee during the puppet presidential elections in 2007.
					
					The disclosure of this case compelled those who rode roughshod, backed by the traitor, to step down and quit political camp one after another for their involvement in a variety of scandals. 
					
					Choe Si Jung who took the lead in the moves to put media under the control of the conservative group resigned as chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee on Jan. 27.
					
					Ri Sang Duk, Lee's elder brother, who styled himself "senior king" is likely to be questioned by prosecution sooner or later for his involvement in scandals now being disclosed in an unbroken chain.
					
					The influence of Ri Jae O fell to the ground though he held the post of the specially appointed minister, acting No. two man in the present "government." It was not only members of the above-said association that met such miserable ends. 
					
					In the wake of resignation of chief secretary for publicity of Chongwadae, deputy minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, etc. Kim Hyo Jae, chief secretary for political affairs of Chongwadae, one of the core staff members, resigned, held accountable for the above-said scandal on February 11. 
					
					Lee is now more dead than alive as he has lost hands and legs with the ruin of his confidants. 
					
					Political experts and media of south Korea had this to say: "Lee Myung Bak is now without his hands and legs. The real forces that backed his regime have collapsed. He is becoming isolated step by step. The collapse of the Six Men's Association will deepen the power crisis in the closing period of Lee's rule."
					
					It is long since the public in the south turned its back on the traitor. There is no room for him to stay in his own camp. 
					
					With the "revamping wind" rising within the ruling party, the pro-Lee camp is now on the passive and the public is getting increasingly assertive demanding his withdrawal from the party.

articles.title: S. Korea: Reunification Champion Declared Guilty
articles.content:
S. Korea: Reunification Champion Declared Guilty
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Chunchon District Court of south Korea sentenced Jong Sol Gyo, a peasant poet and reunification champion, to one year in jail with two-year stay of execution and one-year suspension of qualification, according to the south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo on Feb. 10.
					The court authorities made this decision by dint of the notorious "Security Law" for the mere reason that Jong has done writings criticizing the "government's" policy of spoiling agriculture and calling for national reunification.
					
					Jong declared to go on making writings of conscience in disregard of such court decision.

articles.title: S. Korea's Hypocritical Talk about Issue of Separated Families and Relatives under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Hypocritical Talk about Issue of Separated Families and Relatives under Fire
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Unification Ministry of south Korea calls for the "settlement of the issue of separated families and relatives", trumpeting about the "positive backing for reunions and exchange", says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined commentary Monday. This claim, however, is sophism that can convince no one, the paper says, and goes on:
					Following the agreement to settle the issue of separated families and relatives at the historic meeting in Pyongyang and in the June 15 joint declaration, the north and the south have worked hard for them.
					
					Had the present authorities of south Korea sincerely implemented the inter-Korean declarations, no issue would have cropped up as regards the issue.
					
					One or two reunions of separated families and relatives between the north and the south that had been made under the present conservative "government" were a result of magnanimity and sincere efforts made by the DPRK. 
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group defied the DPRK that was open to improving the relations with the south but escalated confrontation with the DPRK, completely scuttling the reunions that were even few and far between.
					
					Those who turned away from implementing the inter-Korean declarations and vociferate about the "May 24 measure" are now pretending to be interested in the "reunion" of separated families and relatives. This is a red herring to divert the mindset of people elsewhere.
					
					The mean wordplay designed to ease the people's resentment is just aimed to cover up the true colors of the confrontation policy against the DPRK and tide over the worst ruling crisis.

articles.title: NIS Urged to Halt Its Repressive Campaign
articles.content:
IS Urged to Halt Its Repressive Campaign
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Seven organizations including the Bar Association for Democratic Society, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society, the Peace Network and the Women's Society for Peace of south Korea issued a joint statement condemning the fascist actions taken by the Intelligence Service (IS).
					The statement accused the IS of forcibly searching on Feb 8 houses and offices of four leading members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification including O Hye Ran, its secretary general.
					
					Recalling that the authorities are indiscriminately suppressing those organizations desirous of peace and reunification on charges of violation of "Security Law", the statement noted that this is a reckless action to stamp out those organizations.
					
					The actions for U.S. troops' pullout from south Korea, abrogation of alliance between south Korea and the U.S., the dismantlement of "UN Command", etc., which the IS claimed were staged according to the north's instructions were conducted not only by the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification but by many other civic and social organizations, it charged.
					
					It demanded the authorities immediately stop the crackdown upon the just activities of the above-said organizations.

articles.title: Pilot Sentenced to Penal Servitude in S. Korea
articles.content:
Pilot Sentenced to Penal Servitude in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court sentenced a pilot to one and half years in jail and a two-year stay of execution, according to CBS of south Korea on Feb. 10.
					The authorities took this action against him on the charge that he posted more than 600 articles speaking highly of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the north on Internet homepage "Free Forum" developed by him from November of 2008 to August last year.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Equatorial Guinean preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Feb. 8.
					Juan Nko Mbula, first deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the significant anniversaries.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Switzerland
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar on "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might", a famous work of leader Kim Jong Il, was held by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 4.
					A reporter and speakers including Martin Lotscher, chairman of the group, noted that Kim Jong Il in his work mentioned the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in founding and strengthening the DPRK after putting forward the Juche-based idea of state building and the might of the DPRK winning victory after victory in the political and military confrontation with imperialism under the banner of Songun.
					
					They explained and proved that the DPRK government has carried out all its work, putting the interests of the people above anything else, strictly preserved the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction and thoroughly applied the Songun politics in all fields of social construction and thereby the DPRK has turned into a socialist power of Juche with the invincible political and military might.
					
					They expressed belief that the Korean people are sure to win in the struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the exploits of state building and the Songun politics of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nepal
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Sakirmata Publishing House of Nepal on Feb. 7.
					The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in defending and always glorifying President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based idea of state building and feats.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Bulgarian Juche Idea Study Group Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Bulgarian Juche Idea Study Group Held
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea was held in Sofia on February 7.
					Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the group, made a report at the meeting, which was followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers noted that last year the group held colorful events on the major significant days of the DPRK to widely introduce the just cause of the Korean people for national reunification and building of a thriving country among the Bulgarian people and express full support and solidarity with it.
					
					They stressed the need to intensify the work to expand the ranks of the group and introduce the achievements made by the DPRK in socialist construction this year marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Meeting of ARIJI Board of Directors Held
articles.content:
Meeting of ARIJI Board of Directors Held
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 14th Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea (ARIJI) took place in Bangladesh on Feb. 8.
					Present there were Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and the director general and directors of the ARIJI.
					
					The meeting reviewed the Board's work of two years and discussed such matters as ensuring successful holding of the World Conference on the Juche Idea on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and further enhancing the function and role of ARIJI and bringing a turn in study and dissemination of the Juche idea.
					
					Harish Gupta was elected director general of the ARIJI at the meeting. It also selected deputy director general and directors of the board of the institute.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Brazilian Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Brazilian Party
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Communist Party on Jan. 30 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Events paying respects to the great leaders to be held in DPRK" to commemorate the birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) of President Kim Il Sung and the birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Kim Jong Il was the outstanding thinker-theoretician who developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, the article said, and went on:
					
					What holds a specially important place in his ideo-theoretical activities is that he developed in depth the Songun idea based on the Juche idea to suit the new demand of the times and formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism, thus providing a powerful ideological and theoretical guarantee for the socialist cause to always emerge victorious under any grim circumstance and condition.
					
					He was the great master of independent politics.
					
					He performed great feats in defending the world peace and stability and building an independent new world through his energetic external activities.
					
					The visits to China and Russia paid by him several times in recent years are estimated as historic events of weighty significance in easing the situation in Northeast Asia, realizing the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and ensuring the world peace and stability.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Will Be Everlasting: Nigerian, Italian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Will Be Everlasting: Nigerian, Italian Figures
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nigeria and Italy issued statements on Feb. 7 and 8 on the birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) of leader Kim Jong Il.
					M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il authored "On the Juche Idea", "Socialism Is a Science" and many other works to comprehensively systematize, develop and enrich the Juche idea and perfectly formulate the theory on the socialist idea.
					
					What is especially noteworthy in his ideo-theoretical activities is that he developed in depth the Songun idea, the chairman stressed.
					
					The director of the Editorial Board of the Teleambiente TV Consortium of Italy said it was thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK could firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and dynamically advance the cause of national reunification, shattering the moves of all the hostile forces to stifle it.
					
					He made every possible effort to achieve the reunification of the country, the cherished desire of the Korean nation, the director noted, praising his feats for national reunification.
					
					Though he passed away, the great feats he performed for the times and history will be everlasting, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Political Party Organs of Syria, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Political Party Organs of Syria, Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Political party organs of Syria and Bangladesh carried special write-ups and articles on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					The organ of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria on February 1 carried several articles with the portrait of a smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un conducting revolutionary activities.
					
					In an article titled "On the 70th birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" the paper said the international community is praising him as a distinguished great man. He made great contributions to global independence, it noted.
					
					In an article titled "Songun line and Kim Jong Il" it stressed that his Songun politics served as a basic factor that enabled the DPRK, not a big country, to defend its dignity and sovereignty and win victories only, standing up against the U.S. styling itself the world's "only super power".
					
					In another article titled "Socialism wins if it holds on idea and ruins if it neglects it" the paper said the reality of socialist Korea is a clear proof of the might of the theory of ideology of Kim Jong Il who led the Korean people against the moves of the U.S. and the West to stifle the DPRK.
					
					Ekota, the organ of the Bangladesh Communist Party, on Feb. 6 carried an article titled "Faith of DPRK".
					
					The Korean people are bearing in mind the steadfast faith that Kim Jong Il is always alive, it said.
					
					The banner of Songun held high by him will always shine as the banner of victory of socialist Korea and the Songun politics will remain as the basic political mode in the future, too, it noted.

articles.title: Foreign Media Report about Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man
articles.content:
Foreign Media Report about Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries are giving wide publicity to the personality of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a great man.
					Many scenes of Kim Jong Un warmly taking hands of soldiers and hugging them when he inspected units of the Korean People's Army are being reported by media of the DPRK, South China Morning Post, a newspaper of Hong Kong, China, on Jan. 31 said, adding: 
					
					Leader Kim Jong Un learns about heating facilities of barracks, pressure of running water and the keeping of books and even tastes food.
					
					Whenever inspecting military units, he would wear in the same black overcoat as President Kim Il Sung did during his youthful days or in the same padded clothes of light color as leader Kim Jong Il did.
					
					Analysts have estimated that Kim Jong Un is inheriting the work method and style of the President.
					
					All facts show that he has confidently been guiding the whole affairs of the army and the country through his inspection of military units from the outset of the year while enjoying boundless respect and love from service personnel and the people.
					
					The Turkish paper Hurriyet Planet on the same day carried an article praising the benevolent trait of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, with a photo of him warmly taking hands of service personnel.
					
					Experts are unanimous in estimating that he is fully possessed of the President's sincere and warm mode of work, the paper said.
					
					A Nepali paper on Feb. 1 carried an article titled "Kind-hearted image of the DPRK supreme leader" with a photo of him tenderly patting faces of students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School.

articles.title: French Organization Urges S. Korean Authorities to Work for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
French Organization Urges S. Korean Authorities to Work for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on Feb. 6 as regards the fact that the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission sent open questionnaires to the south Korean authorities.
					Pointing to the contents of the Feb. 2 open questionnaires, which solemnly urge the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea to clearly answer the army and people of the DPRK, the statement expressed full sympathy with this.
					
					The south Korean authorities should not seek confrontation and conflict with the DPRK but pay attention to improving the north-south relations and ensuring peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula, the statement said.

articles.title: Chinese FM Calls for Settling Iran's Nuclear Issue through Dialogue
articles.content:
Chinese FM Calls for Settling Iran's Nuclear Issue through Dialogue
Beijing, February 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson of the Chinese Foreign Ministry at the press conference on Friday called for settling Iran's nuclear issue through dialogue.
					He said China consistently insists that dialogue and cooperation are the only right ways for promoting the settlement of Iran's nuclear issue.
					
					Urgent is for the relevant countries to resume dialogue with Iran and for the IAEA to strengthen cooperation with it, he added.

articles.title: Russian Foreign Ministry on Air Forces' Flight Exercises
articles.content:
Russian Foreign Ministry on Air Forces' Flight Exercises
Moscow, February 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Russian Foreign Ministry on Thursday mentioned the flight exercises of the Russian air forces in the sky above the neutral waters of the Pacific Ocean.
					It is the view of Russia that the flight exercises would not have aroused the concerns of Japan, he said.
					
					Clarifying units' combat readiness as one of the important elements for carrying out any military strategy, he said the flight drills were performed strictly in line with the demand of international law and without intruding into the territorial air of the neighbor countries.

articles.title: Russia Puts Efforts into Beefing Naval Strategic Nuclear Forces
articles.content:
Russia Puts Efforts into Beefing Naval Strategic Nuclear Forces
Moscow, February 12 (KCNA) -- Russia puts efforts into beefing up the naval strategic nuclear forces.
					The Russian navy plans to equip its ships with the IBM "Blava" and put strategic nuclear submarine "Yuri Dolgoruki" into commission in 2012.
					
					It is said that "Blava" would become the backbone of the naval strategic nuclear forces and new submarines be loaded with it.

articles.title: Latin American Countries Strengthen Cooperation
articles.content:
Latin American Countries Strengthen Cooperation
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Cuba and Paraguay agreed Thursday to increase cooperation in healthcare, education and other areas.
					The governments of El Salvador and Brazil Wednesday signed new cooperation agreements in the areas such as health, agriculture, public security, social development and institutional strengthening.

articles.title: Global Food Prices Up
articles.content:
Global Food Prices Up
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Global food prices rose in January and may show another rise for February, as concern about bad weather in main growing regions boosted grain and vegetable oil values, the United Nations' food agency said on Thursday. 
					Global food prices rose nearly 2 percent in January from the previous month.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception to Mark Day of Islamic Revolution
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception to Mark Day of Islamic Revolution
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Morteza Moradian arranged a reception on Monday to mark the 33rd anniversary of the victorious Islamic Revolution in Iran. 
					Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Han Yong Bok, deputy director of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, officials concerned, and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					Staff members of the Iranian embassy were on hand.
					
					Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un firma cartas enviadas por varias unidades
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un firma cartas enviadas por varias unidades
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero), el Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito de Corea Kim Jong Un firmo el dia 9 las cartas que le dirigieran los funcionarios y trabajadores de varias unidades, profesores, empleados y alumnos  reflejando sus decisiones de materializar el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Entre los remitentes figuran los funcionarios del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en el distrito de Sonchon, los trabajadores del Complejo de Construccion Hidrelectrica de Kangdong y los Estudios de Filmes para Ninos 26 de Abril de Corea, las muchachas de Pyongyang en Taehung, los profesores, empleados y alumnos de la Escuela Secundaria de Ryongrim del distrito homonimo de la provincia de Jagang, asi como Min Hong Dan, Ri Chuk Bok, Ri Kyong Yon, Ryu So Gum y Ko Hu Hoe, quienes son benditos por el Dirigente.
					
					En las cartas, ellos escribieron su indecible anoranza al Dirigente Kim Jong Il e infinita veneracion al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, quien iguala al primero en la ideologia y rasgos de direccion.

articles.title: Editado libro "General Kim Jong Il, Sol del Songun"
articles.content:
Editado libro "General Kim Jong Il, Sol del Songun"
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- En visperas del 70o aniversario del natalicio del Dirigente     Kim Jong Il, la Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea dio a luz la coleccion de anecdotas revolucionarias "General Kim Jong Il, Sol del Songun" (12 tomos en total). 
					El libro recopila mas de 3 mil 80 anecdotas surgidas en cada dia de los 365 dias del ano y las agrupa en 12 tomos por cada mes. 
					
					Ademas, enumera los titulos y lugares de presentacion de mas de mil 70 obras principales del Dirigente y algunas unidades dirigidas por el en las fechas correspondientes. 
					
					Las anecdotas "La mision de la filosofia", "Bandera del Songun", "La politica de Songun es nuestra vida", etc. explican que el Dirigente perfecciono la idea Juche, la del Songun, concebida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, para hacerla la bandera de victorias en el cumplimiento de la revolucion coreana y la causa de la independencia de la humanidad.  
					
					"Camino inexplorado hacia el monte Paektu", "No vacilen" y otras narran emocionantemente las proezas y los esfuerzos abnegados del Dirigente quien hizo mantener firmemente las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu como linaje eterno de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					 Se leen tambien los episodios impresionantes surgidos cuando el Dirigente dirigia energicamente la construccion y las actividades del partido con la bandera de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche. 
					
					"La cota 351 en la parte oriental del frente", "Acantilado del monte Osong", "Aclamaciones en Phanmunjom", "Se lanza satelite artificial Kwangmyongsong no. 2" y otras alaban las imborrables proezas del Dirigente realizadas en su camino del Songun. 
					
					El Dirigente estuvo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida en el camino de orientacion en tren avivando la llamarada de gran auge revolucionario en todos los dominios de la construccion socialista. 
					
					En ese curso aparecieron "Marcha forzada superando la nevada", "Emulacion de 4 fabricas hermanas", "11o paisaje del Songun-mar de flores de manzanos" y otras anecdotas. 
					
					"Oh, reunificacion de la patria", "Magnanimo como mar", "Episodios por la reunificacion del 15 de Junio", "La patria y la Chongryon", "Fondos de consuelo" transmiten los hechos historicos vinculados con el noble amor del Dirigente por la patria y la nacion. 
					
					"A las 2 de la madrugada en pais isleno", "Lo que dice la crisis del Caribe", "Llamando la primavera del socialismo", "Del fracaso al avance", "Lagrimas del hombre siberiano", "Dia y noche en Lejano Oriente", etc. se refieren a las grandes contribuciones del Dirigente al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					"Himno", "Sol sonriente", "Invariable parte de recepcion", "Eterno Presidente de la Republica", "Anorando al Lider" muestran la noble fidelidad del Dirigente al Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					La coleccion narra tambien que el Dirigente respetaba, confiaba y adoraba mucho a los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses y los camaradas revolucionarios.

articles.title: Cancion "Febrero es la primavera"
articles.content:
Cancion "Febrero es la primavera"
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- En Corea febrero pertenece a la estacion invernal cubierta de nieve.
					Pero, las personas cantan la cancion "Febrero es la primavera".
					
					La cancion refleja el orgullo y el honor del pueblo coreano lleno de jubilo y felicidad motivados por el nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y enfatiza que gracias a la primavera de febrero, el porvenir de Corea sera siempre prometedor.
					
					Cantandola, el pueblo coreano recuerda con gran emocion el dia historico de nacimiento del Dirigente y piensa en el maravilloso futuro mas feliz con el.
					
					Los hijos armados del pueblo coreano, que anhelaban tanto la primavera de renacimiento en la tierra arrebatada por el imperialismo japones, estaban rebosados de la alegria y esperanza por haber nacido en la casa natal del campamento secreto del monte Paektu el Dirigente como el sol que dispensara el brillo primaveral en el camino de la patria y la nacion.
					
					Con el transcurso del siglo, el pueblo se ha hecho dueno eterno de la primavera que ofrece la felicidad y prosperidad.
					
					Gracias a la politica del Songun y la direccion de amor y de abnegacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il para la felicidad del pueblo, se puso en realidad el ideal de la potencia prospera.
					
					El pueblo coreano ha avanzado siguiendo al Dirigente hacia el presente ano en que se abrira la fase trascendental.
					
					Pero, nadie pensaba en acoger sin el Dirigente el dia de su cumpleanos.
					
					En visperas del dia de nacimiento de el, el pueblo coreano canta la cancion recordando su imagen con amplia sonrisa y creyendo en que el esta para siempre como el sol.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia locura antietica del poder surcoreano
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia locura antietica del poder surcoreano
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El dia 8, el Tribunal Local Central de Seul dio orden de arresto a 2 miembros del "Consejo de promocion de la reunificacion de nuestra nacion mediante el sistema federal", quienes procuraron instalar en diciembre del ano pasado el altar de incensacion para expresar las condolencias por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en virtud de la "ley de seguridad".
					La fiscalia titere tambien intenta arrestar a los miembros del "encuentro de victimas por la ley de seguridad estatal" bajo el mismo pretexto.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido el dia 12 senalo que los actos de los miembros de las entidades arriba mencionadas fueron gallardos por reflejar la opinion publica, y continua:
					
					Expresar las condolencias por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il es la obligacion elemental de los miembros de la nacion coreana.
					
					Segun esta opinion publica, los miembros de dichas entidades surcoreanas querian instalar tales altares de incensacion. Estos actos deben ser fomentados debidamente desde el punto de vista de bellas costumbres hereditarias y del anhelo de los connacionales por el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					A pesar de esto, la banda traidora intenta reprimirlos en virtud de la "ley de seguridad", lo cual es imperdonable locura antietica y anti-reunificacion que multiplica sus crimenes.
					
					La banda traidora actua desesperadamente para reprimir a las fuerzas progresistas y de reforma en virtud de la "ley de seguridad".
					
					Su intento es crear la situacion politica de seguridad publica de caracter fascista, reprimir a ciegas a las fuerzas progresistas y de reforma, evadir la crisis de su domino y ganar la victoria en las elecciones de "asambleistas".
					
					Pero, la banda traidora esta equivocada totalmente.
					
					Ella debe deponer por si mismo su poder antes de ser sentenciada por los habitantes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que el Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea habla de la "resolucion del problema de los familiares separados" y de la "activa ayuda por el encuentro y el intercambio", lo cual es un sofisma que no puede persuadir a nadie.
					A traves de la historica cumbre Norte-Sur en Pyongyang y la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, ambas partes coreanas acordaron resolver el problema de familiares y parientes separados y despues, realizaron activamente las labores por el respecto, comienza el comentario y continua:
					
					Si las autoridades actuales surcoreanas hubieran ejecutado sinceramente las declaraciones Norte-Sur, no se presentaria tal problema de encuentro.
					
					Despues de aparecer el conservador "poder" actual, se realizaron uno o dos veces dicho encuentro gracias a la magnanimidad y los sinceros esfuerzos de la parte Norte.
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak congelo por completo el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados que se realizaban de vez en cuando despreciando la voluntad de la RPDC por el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y aferrandose obstinadamente a los alborotos conflictivos.
					
					Estos tipejos todavia niegan la ejecucion de las declaraciones Norte-Sur y hablan de las "medidas del 24 de mayo", pero esta vez  hablan del "encuentro" de los familiares y parientes separados, lo cual es una sutil artimana para desviar la opinion publica.
					
					Esto no pasa de ser vil palabreria para ocultar su naturaleza de la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC y liberar de la crisis de su peor dominio calmando la  colera de la opinion publica.
